author: David Laris
method: The best result is achieved by peeling and de-seeding the cucumber before grating. Hang the grated cucumber in muslin cloth or a tea towel in order to squeeze out all the excess liquid.   Combine the yoghurt, cucumber, lemon juice and garlic. Add a dash of olive oil and sprinkle with paprika.   Perfect for dipping your aubergines in. (See recipe for pur√©ed Aubergine and Garlic Dip.)
ingredients: 350g/12oz Greek yoghurt ,  1 cucumber ,  2 tbsp lemon juice ,  2 cloves of garlic, grated finely ,  dash of extra virgin olive oil,  paprika, for sprinkling
